answers.answer: Depends on the hospital most wont until youre at least 39 weeks
I got diabetes with this pregnancy and im getting induced on the 16th..baby will be here on the 17th
I'm not sure about you being diabetic and them inducing early but my doctor won't induce until 39 weeks unless there's a medical issue.
So they will induce you 1 day before your actual due date?
Oh ill be 39 weeks 0 days when baby is born
I wouldn't mind getting induced at 39 but I really don't want to go to 49weeks I know it's only a week apart but I'm so over it.. This pregnancy has been very difficult for me :(

question: I'm 37weeks and I have a doctors appointment tomorrow, I really want to discuss having this baby before my due date. I have diabetes I'm on insulin and I'm just ready to have my baby. Does anyone know if they will consider inducing me at around 38/39 weeks as I've heard diabetes don't go full term.
title: Want to get induced
